title: Martis vicesimo primo die Octobr. 1684 annoq, regni Regis Caroli Secundi, Angli√¶ &c. tricesimo sexto it is ordered by this court that the order hereafter following (against servants being retained without a testimonial) made at the last quarter sessions held for this city, shall be forthwith printed and published ... / Lond. ss. ad General Quarterial' Sessionem pacis Domini Regis, tent' pro Civitat' London, per adjournament' apud Justice-Hall in le Old-Baily, London, die Mercurii, scilicet Octavo die Octobris, anno regni Regis Caroli secundi, nunc Angl' &c. tricesimo sexto.
author: England and Wales. Court of Quarter Sessions of the Peace (London)
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Samuel Roycraft, printer to this honourable city,
